snippet.title: HoverGrease 2 - Steam Next Fest February 2025 - Open-Beta Demo
snippet.description:
TOP-DOWN SHOOTER meets HERO SHOOTER in the electrifying, fast-paced world of HoverGrease 2!

🔥 WISHLIST NOW 👉 https://hovergrease.com/r/steam?s=ytat

💥 Step into a dystopian bio-cyberpunk battlefield where mutants clash in chaotic, high-speed combat. Master unique heroes, wield devastating abilities, and conquer both the 14-chapter Singleplayer Story Mode and adrenaline-pumping 5v5 Multiplayer battles.

🎮 ABOUT HOVERGREASE 2
A unique fusion of twin-stick shooting and hero-driven team combat, HoverGrease 2 delivers fast, skill-based action with: ✅ 10 distinct mutants—each with their own abilities and playstyles
✅ Over 180 weapons and attacks to unleash chaos
✅ No pay-to-win—everything is unlocked from the start

🔗 LEARN MORE: https://hovergrease.com

💥 Like, subscribe, and hit the 🔔 for exclusive updates!

#HoverGrease2 #PCGaming #HeroShooter #TopDownShooter #Cyberpunk #GamingTrailer
